about.title: About Delish-Kh
about.subtitle: Bringing authentic Khmer flavors to your table since 2020
about.storyPara1: Delish-Kh was born from a passion for preserving and sharing the rich culinary heritage of Cambodia. Our journey began with a simple dream: to make authentic Khmer cuisine accessible to everyone, whether you're a local foodie or discovering these flavors for the first time.
about.storyPara2: Every dish we serve is crafted with traditional recipes passed down through generations, using the freshest local ingredients and time-honored cooking techniques. We believe that food is more than just sustenance â€“ it's a celebration of culture, family, and community.
about.authenticRecipesDesc: Traditional Khmer recipes prepared with love and respect for our culinary heritage
about.freshIngredientsDesc: We source the finest local ingredients daily to ensure quality and freshness
about.fastDeliveryDesc: Hot, fresh meals delivered to your door with care and speed
about.neangDesc: With over 15 years of experience in Khmer cuisine, Neang brings authentic flavors and innovative techniques to every dish.
about.vizaDesc: Viza specializes in traditional Khmer desserts, creating sweet masterpieces that honor our heritage.
about.awardWinningDesc: Recognized for excellence in preserving and innovating traditional Khmer dishes.
about.alwaysFreshDesc: Every dish is prepared fresh to order, ensuring the best taste and quality.
about.sustainableDesc: We support local farmers and use eco-friendly packaging for all deliveries.
about.madeWithLoveDesc: Every meal is crafted with passion, care, and respect for our culinary traditions.
about.ctaTitle: Ready to Experience Authentic Khmer Cuisine?
about.ctaSubtitle: Explore our menu and taste the difference that passion and tradition make
